Comments_List: I developed skills to write analytical paper and knowledge on democratic theory.

The strengths of this class was the professor's will to engage with student's questions and comments, her motivation in making us questions the assumptions with which we came in the class, and making it dialogue with democratic theory. Her feedback on our work (wikipedia, presentation, response paper) was very useful.

I would definitely recommend this class to students who are motivated to challenge their conceptions about democracy and the system in which we live. You will be able to read fundamental texts of democratic theorist, receive interesting and helpful feedback on your work, learn how to contribute to wikipedia... This class is a must-have in political theory!
